37 enum class QueryFlag {
38  kStatic = physx::PxQueryFlag::eSTATIC, // Traverse static shapes.
39  kDynamic = physx::PxQueryFlag::eDYNAMIC, // Traverse dynamic shapes
40  kPreFilter = physx::PxQueryFlag::ePREFILTER, // Run the pre-intersection-test filter (see PxQueryFilterCallback::preFilter()).
41  kPostFilter = physx::PxQueryFlag::ePOSTFILTER, // Run the post-intersection-test filter (see PxQueryFilterCallback::postFilter()).
42  kAnyHit = physx::PxQueryFlag::eANY_HIT, // Abort traversal as soon as any hit is found and return it via callback.block. Helps query performance. Both eTOUCH and eBLOCK hitTypes are considered hits with this flag.
43  kNoBlock = physx::PxQueryFlag::eNO_BLOCK, // All hits are reported as touching. Overrides eBLOCK returned from user filters with eTOUCH. This is also an optimization hint that may improve query performance.
44  kReserved = physx::PxQueryFlag::eRESERVED // Reserved for physx internal use.
45 };
46 typedef QFlags<QueryFlag> QueryFlags;
47 Q_DECLARE_OPERATORS_FOR_FLAGS(QueryFlags)
